question: Question_05_(a)
statement:
Given the function

\begin{align*}f(t) = \begin{cases}
0, & t<1 \\
2\pi, & 1 \leq t < 2 \\
\pi, & t \geq 2
\end{cases}\end{align*}

\textbf{(a)} Find the Laplace transform of \emph{f(t)}.
hints:
Recall that the Laplace transform for a function f(t) is

\begin{align*}\mathcal{L}(f(t))=\int_0^\infty{}f(t)\exp(-st)dt\end{align*}
How do we integrate a piecewise function?
